title: Brand new, renovated apartment with washer & dryer!!
map_address: 510 Fall River Terrace near S Mathilda
posting_body: Woodmont Real Estate Services is committed to help you find your new home from wherever you are.
We strive to create communities where people feel at home and invite you to virtually experience a tour of our modern living interiors and life enriching amenities.
Our leasing process will save you time by choosing the home that feels right for you- all from the comfort of where you are.
For more information about apartment communities available in Northern California, visit <URL>
Villa Cerise Apartments blends a Mediterranean style with white stucco exterior and blue tile roofs.
The two and three story buildings combine open decks, patios and garden walls.
Within walking distance is the Sunnyvale town Center including banks, shopping, eateries and entertainment.
Villa Cerise Apartments is located at 510 Fall River Terrace in Sunnyvale.
